charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons for a term of one day. Consists of a term of one day at Counts 1 to be served concurrently with Count 2. The defendant shall be placed in the lockup of the U.S. Marshal, Johnstown, Pennsylvania, to be released this date at the order of this Court. Supervised Release for a term of 1 year on Count 1 to be served concurrently with Count 2. Defendant shall be placed on home detention for a period of 2 months with said conditions of home confinement and with standard conditions of supervised release. No Fine. Special Assessment of $50.00 due immediately. Restitution in the amount of $60,283.52 payable to PACOE Federal Credit Union. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:1006 False statement on credit union documents (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons for a term of 1 day to be served concurrently with Count 1. The defendant shall be placed in the lockup of the U.S. Marshal, Johnstown, Pennsylvania to be released this date at the order of this Court. Defendant is placed on supervised release for a term of 5 years to be served concurrently with Count 1. Defendant shall be placed on home detention for a period of 2 months with said conditions of home confinement and with standard conditions of supervised release. No Fine. Special Assessment of $50.00 due immediately. Restitution in the amount of $60,285.52 payable to PACOE Federal Credit Union. No Costs. (2)
